ì»´í“¨í„°ê°€ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ ë‹¤ë£¨ëŠ” ë°©ë²•

(ë§ˆì¹˜ 1/3 ì„ 0.333333... ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ 0.33 ìœ¼ë¡œ í‘œí˜„í•˜ë“¯) ì´ì™€ ê°™ì€ ë°˜ì˜¬ë¦¼ì˜¤ì°¨ê°€ ê³„ì‚°ì„ í•˜ê¸° ì „ì— ë°œìƒí•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ê·¸ ì˜¤ì°¨ë¡œ ì¸í•´ 0.1 + 0.2 = 0.30000000000000004 ì™€ ê°™ì€ ìƒí™©ì´ ë°œìƒí•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.

ë“œë””ì–´ console.log(0.1 + 0.2) ê°€ 0.30000000000000004 ê°€ ë˜ëŠ”ì§€ ëˆˆìœ¼ë¡œ í™•ì¸í–ˆë‹¤.

ê·¸ëŸ¼ ì™œ 0.1 + 0.3 = 0.4 ì´ê³  0.1 + 0.4 = 0.5 ì¸ ê±¸ê¹Œ?

0.1 + 0.3 = 0.4 ëŠ” ì‹¤ì œ ê²°ê³¼ê°’ì€ 0.4ëŠ” ì•„ë‹ˆì§€ë§Œ êµ‰ì¥íˆ 0.4ì™€ ê°€ê¹ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— 0.4ê°€ ëœë‹¤. ë°˜ì˜¬ë¦¼í•œ ê²°ê³¼ê°€ ë§ˆì¹¨ 0.4 ì¸ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.

0.1 + 0.4 = 0.5 ëŠ” ì •í™•í•˜ê²Œ floating-point numberì— ì¼ì¹˜í•œë‹¤. í•œë§ˆë””ë¡œ ë”± ë–¨ì–´ì§„ë‹¤. ê³„ì‚°ê¸°ì— ì°ì–´ë´ë„ ê¹”ë”í•˜ê²Œ ë–¨ì–´ì§€ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. 0.1ê³¼ 0.4ì˜ ë³€í™˜ê°’ì˜ ì˜¤ì°¨ë¥¼ ì„œë¡œê°€ ìº”ìŠ¬ì‹œì¼œì¤€ë‹¤ê³  í•œë‹¤.

í•´ê²°ì±…

ì ì´ì œ ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ê°€ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ ìˆ«ìì™€ ì†Œìˆ˜ì ì„ ë‹¤ë£¨ê³  ê³„ì‚°í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ ì•Œì•˜ìœ¼ë‹ˆ (ì•„ì§ ì˜ ëª¨ë¥´ê² ë‹¤ë©´ floating point number ì— ëŒ€í•´ ë” ê²€ìƒ‰í•´ë³´ì...ã… ã… ) í•´ê²°ì±…ì„ ì°¾ì•„ë³´ì. í•´ê²°ì±…ì€ ì´ ê³³ ì—ì„œ 3ê°€ì§€ë¥¼ ì œì‹œí•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤.

  1. ì¤‘ìš”í•œ ì—°ì‚°ì‘ì—…(ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ë©´ ëˆ ê³„ì‚°)ì¼ ê²½ìš° íŠ¹ë³„í•œ íƒ€ì…ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.
    • ì´ ë¶€ë¶„ì€ ë³„ë¡œ ê³µê°ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤. ë°˜ìª½ì§œë¦¬ í•´ê²°ì±… ê°™ë‹¤.
  2. toFixed ë©”ì†Œë“œë‚˜ toPercision ë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•´ì„œ ë°˜ì˜¬ë¦¼ì„ í•œë‹¤.
  3. ì •ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë°”ê¿”ì„œ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ê¸°. (0.1 * 10 + 0.2 * 10) / 10 = 0.3
    • í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì´ ê²ƒì€ ë” ë§ì€ ì‘ì—…ì„ ì´ˆë˜í•˜ê³  ë˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì•¼ê¸°ì‹œí‚¬ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ê·¼ë° ê°œì¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì†Œìˆ˜ì  ì—°ì‚°ì„ í•  ë•ŒëŠ” bignumber.js ê°€ ì§±ì¸ê±° ê°™ë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¼ bignumberëŠ” ì–´ë–»ê²Œ í•´ê²°í•œê±¸ê¹Œ? ì´ê±´ ì¢€ ë” ì•Œì•„ë´ì•¼ê² ë‹¤. ì˜ˆìƒì€ í˜œê²°ì±… 1ë²ˆì˜ Arbitrary-Precision Decimal ì²˜ëŸ¼ ê°€ìˆ˜ë‚˜ ì§€ìˆ˜ì˜ ê¸¸ì´ë¥¼ ëŠ˜ë ¤ì„œ ì˜¤ì°¨ë¥¼ ì¤„ì´ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ì¼ ê²ƒ ê°™ë‹¤.

DEEP DIVING! ê¹Šê²Œ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ë³´ì!

ì´ì™• ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ëœ ê±° ì¢€ ë” deep í•˜ê²Œ ë¶€ë™ì†Œìˆ˜ì ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•„ë³´ì!

ìš©ì–´ ì •ë¦¬

  • float: 32bitì•ˆì—ì„œ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í‘œì‹œí•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•
    • 0 ~ 22 bit: ê°€ìˆ˜
    • 23 ~ 30 bit: ì§€ìˆ˜
    • 31 bit: ë¶€í˜¸
  • double: 64bitì•ˆì—ì„œ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í‘œì‹œí•˜ëŠ” ë°©ë²•
    • 0 ~ 51 bit: ê°€ìˆ˜
    • 52 ~ 62 bit: ì§€ìˆ˜
    • 63 bit: ë¶€í˜¸
    • float ë³´ë‹¤ 2ë°° ë” ì •ë°€í•˜ê²Œ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í‘œí˜„í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì§€ë§Œ 2ë°° ë” ìš©ëŸ‰ì„ ì°¨ì§€í•œë‹¤.
    • ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ëŠ” doubleë¡œ ìˆ«ìë¥¼ í‘œí˜„í•œë‹¤.

item.content:encoded:
ì´ ë‚´ìš©ì€ Deep-copying in JavaScriptë¥¼ ë²ˆì—­ ë° ìˆ˜ì •í•œ ë‚´ìš©ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ì—ì„œ object ë¥¼ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ ë³µì‚¬í• ê¹Œ? ë§¤ìš° ë‹¨ìˆœí•œ ì§ˆë¬¸ì´ì§€ë§Œ ì •ë‹µì€ ë‹¨ìˆœí•˜ì§€ ì•Šë‹¤.

Call by reference

ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ê°ì²´(Object)ëŠ” ë ˆí¼ëŸ°ìŠ¤ë¡œ ì „ë‹¬ëœë‹¤. (ë°°ì—´ ë˜í•œ ë°°ì—´ìŠ¤ëŸ¬ìš´ ê°ì²´ë‹¤.) ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´ë³´ì.

ê°ì²´ê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ì›ì‹œê°’(number, string, boolean ë“±)ì˜ ê²½ìš° 'call by value' ë°©ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¥¼ ì „ë‹¬í•œë‹¤. íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¥¼ ì „ë‹¬ë°›ì€ í•¨ìˆ˜ëŠ” ê°’ì„ ë³µì‚¬í•´ì„œ í•¨ìˆ˜ ë‚´ë¶€ì—ì„œë§Œ ì ìš©ë˜ëŠ” ë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤. í•¨ìˆ˜ë‚´ì—ì„œ ê°’ì„ ì•„ë¬´ë¦¬ ì§€ì§€ê³  ë³¶ì•„ë„ í•¨ìˆ˜ì˜ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¡œ ì „ë‹¬í•œ ì‹¤ì œ ê°’ì€ ë³€í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ê°ì²´ëŠ” 'call by reference' ë°©ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¥¼ ì „ë‹¬í•œë‹¤. ì¦‰, ê°’ì„ ë³µì‚¬í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ì‹¤ì œë¡œ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ì— ì˜¬ë¼ì™€ ìˆëŠ” ê°’ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤. ê·¸ë ‡ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— í•¨ìˆ˜ë‚´ì—ì„œ ê·¸ ê°’ì„ ë³€ê²½í•˜ë©´ í•¨ìˆ˜ ë°–ì˜ ì‹¤ì œ ê°’ë„ ë™ì¼í•˜ê²Œ ë³€ê²½ë˜ëŠ” ê²ƒê³¼ ê°™ì€ í˜„ìƒì´ ë°œìƒí•œë‹¤.

í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ê°€ë”ì€ ì‹¤ì œ ê°’ì„ ìœ ì§€í•œ ì±„ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•´ì„œ í•¨ìˆ˜ë‚´ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì„ ê²½ìš°ê°€ ìˆë‹¤.

Shallow copy: Object.assign()

ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•˜ëŠ” í•œê°€ì§€ ë°©ë²•ì€ Object.assign() ë©”ì†Œë“œë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ì´ ë©”ì†Œë“œëŠ” ì—¬ëŸ¬ ê°ì²´ì˜ ì†ì„±ë“¤(í”„ë¡œí† íƒ€ì… ì²´ì´ë‹ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ìì²´ ì†ì„±ë“¤)ì„ ë³µì‚¬í•´ì„œ í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.

í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì´ê²ƒì€ ì–•ì€ ë³µì‚¬(Shallow copy) ë¼ê³  í•œë‹¤. ì™œ ì–•ë‹¤ëŠ” í‘œí˜„ì„ ì“°ëƒë©´, ê°ì²´ê°€ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì†ì„±ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆì„ ê²½ìš° ê°ì²´ì˜ ë ˆí¼ëŸ°ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê°ì²´ì•ˆì˜ ê°ì²´ëŠ” ë³µì‚¬ê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ì°¸ì¡°ê°€ ë  ë¿ì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì´ë‹¤.

ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´ë³´ì.

ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•˜ëŠ” ê°€ì¥ ì˜¤ë˜ëœ ë°©ë²• ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ëŠ” JSON.stringify í•œ ë¬¸ìì—´ì„ ë‹¤ì‹œ JSON.parse í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ì´ê²ƒì˜ ë‹¨ì ì€ ì„ì‹œì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê¸´ ë¬¸ìì—´ì„ ë‹¨ì§€ parser ì— ë‹¤ì‹œ ë„£ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ìƒì„±í•œë‹¤ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ë˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ë‹¨ì ì€ ìˆœí™˜í˜• ê°ì²´ëŠ” ì´ ì ‘ê·¼ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œ í•´ê²°í•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ë‹¤. ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´ íŠ¸ë¦¬ í˜•ì‹ì˜ êµ¬ì¡°ì²´ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ ë•Œ ìì‹ì´ ë¶€ëª¨ë¥¼ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°, ê²°êµ­ ë‹¤ì‹œ ìì‹ ì„ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. (ë¶€ëª¨ëŠ” ê¸°ë³¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ìì‹ì„ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ê³  ìˆìœ¼ë‹ˆê¹Œ) ë˜í•œ Maps, Sets, RegExps, Dates, ArrayBuffers ê°™ì€ íƒ€ì…ì€ ê·¸ íŠ¹ì„±ì„ ìƒëŠ”ë‹¤.

MessageChannel

postMessage ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ structured clone ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. MessageChannel ì„ ìƒì„±í•´ì„œ ìê¸°ìì‹ ì—ê²Œ ë©”ì‹œì§€ë¥¼ ë³´ë‚¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ë¦¬ì‹œë²„ì—ì„œ ë³µì‚¬ëœ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì–»ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ë‹¨ì ì€ ì´ ë°©ì‹ì€ ë¹„ë™ê¸° ë°©ì‹ì´ë‹¤. í° ë¬¸ì œê°€ ì•„ë‹ìˆ˜ ìˆì§€ë§Œ ë™ê¸°ë¡œ ë³µì‚¬ë¥¼ í•´ì•¼ í•  ë•Œê°€ ìˆì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

1function structuralClone(obj) {
2  return new Promise(resolve => {

4    port2.onmessage = ev => resolve(ev.data);

9const obj = /* ... */;

ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì—”ì§„ì— ì˜í–¥ì„ ë¼ì¹˜ê¸´ í•˜ì§€ë§Œ, ì›í•˜ëŠ” ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ì„ ì–»ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ë˜í•œ ì‚¬íŒŒë¦¬ì—ì„œëŠ” replaceStateë¥¼ 30ì´ˆì— 100 ë²ˆë§Œ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ë„ë¡ ì œí•œí•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤.

Notification API

ì§§ê³  ê°„ê²°í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ê¶Œí•œì„ ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ë¡œë¶€í„° ë°›ì•„ì•¼í•˜ê³  ì‚¬íŒŒë¦¬ì—ì„œëŠ” ëª‡ëª‡ ì´ìœ ë¡œ í•­ìƒ undefined ë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•œë‹¤.

1var countFactory = (function() {
2  var staticCount = 0;
3  
4  return function() {
5    var localCount = 0;
6    
7    return {
8      increase: function() {
9        return {
10          static: ++staticCount,
11          local: ++localCount
12        };
13      },
14      decrease: function() {
15        return {
16          static: --staticCount,
17          local: --localCount
18        };
19      }
20    };
21  };
22})();
23
24var counter = countFactory();
25var counter2 = countFactory();
26
27console.log(counter.increase());
28console.log(counter.increase());
29console.log(counter2.decrease());
30console.log(counter.increase());

12    (function() {
13      var pendingInterval = false;
14      var div = document.getElementById("divPending");
15      var btn = document.getElementById("btnToggle");
16      
17      function startPending() {
18        if (div.innerHTML.length > 13) {
19          div.innerHTML = "Pending";
20        }
21        div.innerHTML += ".";
22      };
23      
24      btn.addEventListener("click", function() {
25        if (!pendingInterval) {
26          pendingInterval = setInterval(startPending, 500);
27        } else {

29          pendingInterval = false;
30        }
31      });

20      
21      function append(e) {

23        var callbackFunction = callback[target.getAttribute("data-cb")];
24        appendDiv.appendChild(callbackFunction());
25      };
26      
27      var callback = {
28        "1": (function () {
29          var div = document.createElement("div");
30          div.innerHTML = "Adding new div";
31          return function () {
32            return div.cloneNode(true);
33          };
34        })(),
35        "2": (function () {

41        })(),
42        "delete": function() {

44          return document.createTextNode("Cleared");
45        }
46      };
47    })();
48  </script>

1<!DOCTYPE html>

57    <script>
58        (function() {

102            .addEventListener("click", function() {
103                this.classList.toggle("highlight");

1(function() {

21  function wrapObject(obj, wrapper) {

33    func.apply(this, Array.prototype.slice(arguments, 1));
34  });
35  
36  car.accelerator();
37  car.beep();
38  car.brake();
39})();

1<!DOCTYPE html>
2<html>
3<head>
4  <meta charset="utf-8">
5  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width">
6  <title>ë°ì½”ë ˆì´í„° íŒ¨í„´</title>
7</head>
8<body>
9<form id="personalInformation">
10    <label>First name: <input type="text" class="validate" data-validate-rules="required alphabet" name="firstName"></label><br/>
11    <label>Last name: <input type="text" class="validate" data-validate-rules="required alphabet" name="lastName"></label><br/>
12    <label>Age: <input type="text" class="validate" data-validate-rules="number" name="age"></label><br/>
13    <label>Gender: 
14        <select class="validate" data-validate-rules="required">
15            <option>Male</option>
16            <option>Female</option>
17        </select>
18    </label><br/>
19    <input type="submit">
20</form>
21<script>
22    (function() {
23        var formPersonalInformation = document.getElementById("personalInformation"),
24        validator = new Validator(formPersonalInformation);
25
26        function Validator(form) {
27            this.validatingForm = form;
28            form.addEventListener("submit", function() {
29                if (!validator.validate(this)) {
30                    event.preventDefault();
31                    event.returnValue = false;
32                    return false;
33                }
34                alert("Success to validate");
35                return true;
36            });
37        }
38
39        Validator.prototype.ruleSet = {};
40        Validator.prototype.decorate = function(ruleName, ruleFunction) {
41            this.ruleSet[ruleName] = ruleFunction;
42        }
43        Validator.prototype.validate = function(form) {
44            var validatingForm = form || this.validatingForm,
45            inputs = validatingForm.getElementsByClassName("validate"),
46            length = inputs.length,
47            i, j,
48            input,
49            checkRules,
50            rule,
51            ruleLength;
52
53            for(i = 0; i<length; i++) {
54                input = inputs[i];
55                if (input.dataset.validateRules) {
56                    checkRules = input.dataset.validateRules.split(" ");
57                    ruleLength = checkRules.length;
58                    for(j = 0; j<ruleLength; j++) {
59                        rule = checkRules[j];
60                        if (this.ruleSet.hasOwnProperty(rule)) {
61                            if (!this.ruleSet[rule].call(null, input)) {
62                                return false;
63                            }
64                        }
65                    }
66                }
67            }
68
69            return true;
70        }
71        validator.decorate("required", function (input) {
72            if (!input.value) {
73                alert(input.name + " is required");
74                return false;
75            }
76            return true;
77        });
78        validator.decorate("alphabet", function (input) {
79            var regex = /^[a-zA-Z\s]*$/;
80            if (!regex.test(input.value)) {
81                alert(input.name + " has to be only alphabets");
82                return false;
83            }
84            return true;
85        });
86        validator.decorate("number", function (input) {
87            var regex = /^[0-9]{1,}$/;
88            if(!regex.test(input.value)) {
89                alert(input.name + " has to be only numbers");
90                return false;
91            }
92            return true;
93        });
94    })();
95</script>
96</body>
97</html>

1<!DOCTYPE html>

37            divCommentRow = document.createElement("div"),

8    <style>
9        #noticeWrapper {

11            height: 20px;
12            width: 200px;
13            position: relative;
14            border: 1px solid black;

16
17        #notice {
18            position: absolute;

20            padding: 0;

22        }
23
24        .noticeSubject {

38<body>
39    <div class="noReflow">
40        I'll nor reflow
41    </div>
42    <div id="noticeWrapper">
43        <ul id="notice">
44            <li class="noticeSubject">Link to the first article</li>
45            <li class="noticeSubject">Link to the second article</li>
46            <li class="noticeSubject">Link to the third article</li>
47            <li class="noticeSubject">Link to the last article</li>
48        </ul>
49    </div>
50    <div class="noReflow">
51        Neither me
52    </div>
53    <script>
54        (function() {
55            var ulNotice = document.getElementById('notice'),
56            currentNoticeTop = 0,
57            currentIndex = 0,
58            maxIndex = ulNotice.getElementsByClassName('noticeSubject').length - 1,
59            currentRollingUp = true,
60            subjectHeight = 20,
61            velocityPerSecond = 20,
62            previousFrame = null;
63
64            setTimeout(rollNextNotice, 0);
65
66            function rollNextNotice() {

70            function rollNotice(time) {
71                var diff = (previousFrame !== null ? time - previousFrame : 0);
72                previousFrame = time;
73                currentNoticeTop += (diff / 1000) * velocityPerSecond;
74
75                if (currentNoticeTop * velocityPerSecond >= currentIndex * -subjectHeight * velocityPerSecond) {
76                    if (currentIndex === maxIndex || currentIndex === 0) {
77                        currentRollingUp = !currentRollingUp;
78                        velocityPerSecond = -velocityPerSecond;
79                    }
80
81                    currentNoticeTop = currentIndex * -subjectHeight;
82                    currentIndex += (currentRollingUp ? -1 : 1);
83                    previousFrame = null;
84                    setTimeout(rollNextNotice, 1000);
85                } else {
86                    requestAnimationFrame(rollNotice);
87                }
88                ulNotice.style.top = currentNoticeTop + 'px';
89            }
90        })();

2(function () {

4        'doLargeLoop': function() {
5            var i, sum = 0,
6            start, end;

9            start = Date.now();
10            for (i = 0; i < 10000000000; i++) {

13
14            end = Date.now();

18

1function Rectangle(width, height) {

item.content:encoded:
ë°ë·°2017ì— ì°¸ì—¬í–ˆë‹¤.

RESTëŠ” ì„œë²„ì™€ í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì‚¬ì´ì˜ í†µì‹  ê´€ë ¨ ì•„í‚¤í…ì³ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ì„ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¨ë‹¤. RESTëŠ” ì œì•½ì¡°ê±´ì´ ìˆëŠ”ë° ì´ê²ƒì„ ë°˜ë“œì‹œ ì§€ì¼œì•¼ RESTë¼ê³  í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ ì¼ë°˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©ë˜ì–´ì§€ê³  ìˆëŠ” REST APIëŠ” ì—¬ëŸ¬ ì œì•½ì¡°ê±´ ì¤‘ì—ì„œ Uniform Interfaceê°€ ì˜ ì§€ì¼œì§€ì§€ ì•Šê¸° ë–„ë¬¸ì— ì§„ì •í•œ ì˜ë¯¸ì—ì„œ REST APIë¼ê³  ë¶€ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ ì—†ë‹¤.

item.title: Webpack Loader
item.content:encoded:
Webpack Loader

webpack can only process Javascript natively, but loaders are used to transform other resources into Javascript. By doing so, every resource forms a module

  • ì›¹íŒ©ì€ ìë°”ìŠ¤í¬ë¦½íŠ¸ íŒŒì¼ë§Œ ì²˜ë¦¬ê°€ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë„ë¡ ë˜ì–´ ìˆë‹¤.

2    entry: {
3        // â€¦
4    },
5    output: {
6        // â€¦
7    },
8    module: {
9        rules: [
10            { test: /\.css$/, use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader'] }
11        ]
12    }
13};

7    ]
8}
  • ìœ„ ì„¤ì • íŒŒì¼ì„ webpackìœ¼ë¡œ ë²ˆë“¤ë§ í•œ ê²°ê³¼ë¬¼ì€ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ë‹¤.
